code: @SuppressForbidden(reason = "create the actual proxy") private Proxy createProxy(Proxy.Type type, Object[] address) {     return new Proxy(type, new InetSocketAddress((String) address[0], (int) address[1])). }

// returns hostname (string), port (int) private static Object[] host(String address, int defaultPort) {     if (!StringUtils.hasText(address)) {         return null.     }     try {         URI uri = new URI(address).         Object[] results = { uri.getHost(), uri.getPort() > 0 ? uri.getPort() : defaultPort }.         return results.     } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {         throw new ClientException("Unrecognized address format " + address, ex).     } }
